issue.title: [Python] Remove global SerializationContext variables
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2024](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2024). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should get rid of the global variables `{{_default_serialization_context`}} and `{{pandas_serialization_context`}} and replace them with functions `{{default_serialization_context()`}} and `{{pandas_serialization_context()`}}.

This will also make it faster to do `{{import pyarrow`}}.
